text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int max = 0 ; int n , i , j ; scanf ( "%u" , & n ) ; int ar [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { int s = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ i ] [ j ] ) ; s = s + ar [ i ] [ j ] ; } if ( s > max ) max = s ; } printf ( "%d" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
